snippet.title: Hotel R'n'R Official Trailer VR Smash 'em up Oculus SteamVR
snippet.description:
You are a failed musician who makes a deal with me, the Devil. I give you musical talent, infamy and hard cash, and all you have to do is smash up some hotel rooms for me. Build up your armoury with weapons from Hell’s own pawn shop - and don’t let anyone catch you.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1011290/Hotel_RnR/
